categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Gold Squadron was a unit of three B-wing starfighters in the fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, an Imperial Navy group attacked the cruiser Lulsla, an MC80 cruiser that the unit was stationed at. They were destroyed by the Imperial forces, largely thanks to the TIE pilot ace Maarek Stele.
